column5: went out to the old canal on Martindale Pond today went 1-3 on carp plus numerous bluegills and one Largemouth i also found out that carp are tricky to land with one hand on your pole and the other on a net thats almost to short well here are some pictures
Hello, coming to join the exiles?
Nice! I am going to be making it out to Port Dalhousie this long weekend for sure...maybe I'll see you around!
you never know look for some one fishing for carp or the legendary pink hat
hahaha. I have noticed you've been wearing that hat in your pics...and they seem to be over several years!

The fish in Martindale will be spooked for at least a week come Friday and there won't be any available shoreline. The Henley rowing regatta beings this weekend. Hundreds of rowing shells and motor boats zipping back and forth 12 hours a day.
Damn...that is a good point..   Maybe I'll check out Windmill Point in Fort Erie, and head down to the Niagara Glen....
